# **pyfiglet**

```
    __                ____ ___  _______
```

## **설치**
```py
pip install banner_hun0219==0.3.2
```
## **배너**
```py
$ show-banner
    __                ____ ___  _______
   / /_  __  ______  / __ \__ \<  / __ \
  / __ \/ / / / __ \/ / / /_/ // / /_/ /
 / / / / /_/ / / / / /_/ / __// /\__, /
/_/ /_/\__,_/_/ /_/\____/____/_//____/

```
